sentence.Network_en: This article reviewed the recent research in the effect of high pressure on muscle tenderization.
sentence.Network_cn: 就高压处理对僵直前后肌肉嫩度的影响研究概况做以简单介绍.

sentence.Network_en: These results showed that hydrostatic high - pressure technology could be applied to tenderization of muscle meat.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一研究结果对于进一步研究高压技术对于肉类的嫩化作用具有很大意义.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 这一过程称为肉的嫩化(tenderization)或熟化(maturation)。肌肉的生长发育是一个长期的动态过程,因此猪肉品质的形成也是一个渐进的过程,肉品的很多性状在动物生长发育.

tenderization 嫩度, tenderization 师范大学, tenderization 巧克力
tenderization 浊音化, tenderization 经营的, tenderization 神化
